name: Pop Mania
description:
Pop Mania is a chain based puzzle game with both manually designed stages to solve and random modes to express your skills and creativity. It has an "easy to learn, hard to master" spirit and classic arcade vibes with real depth.

Solve more than 100 stages in the Journey mode. Adjust the difficulty (easy, normal or hard). Unlock all the floors and b-sides.

Try the random modes : do your best combo in "One Shot" mode and try to survive in "Survival". Improve your skills in the Training mode.

Get trophies and prizes. Unlock the high speed gameplay to play as a pro. Get the "musical" sounds to chill. Open gifts to get alternatives visuals. Discover secrets !

Pop Mania offers challenges, tons of fun and surprises. More than that, the random modes provide this rare feeling of gigantic margin of skill progress and the high satisfaction that goes with the flow and the mastery.
